name: Over Speeding
description: Exceeding the prescribed speed limit

name: Driving Without License
description: Operating a vehicle without a valid driving license

name: Red Light Violation
description: Crossing a traffic signal on red light

name: Wrong Way Driving
description: Driving vehicle on wrong side or in wrong direction

name: No Seat Belt
description: Not wearing seat belt while driving

name: Using Mobile While Driving
description: Using mobile phone while driving without hands-free

name: No Helmet
description: Riding motorcycle without helmet

name: Overloading
description: Carrying passengers or load beyond permitted limit

name: Expired Registration
description: Vehicle registration expired

name: No Number Plate
description: Missing or defaced number plate

name: Reckless Driving
description: Driving in rash or negligent manner

name: Illegal Parking
description: Parking in no-parking zone or blocking traffic

name: No Vehicle Fitness Certificate
description: Operating vehicle without valid fitness certificate

name: Triple Riding
description: More than two persons on a motorcycle

name: Tinted Glass
description: Using illegal tinted glass or sun film

name: Smoke Emission
description: Emitting excessive smoke from vehicle

name: Lane Violation
description: Not following proper lane discipline

name: No Insurance
description: Vehicle without valid insurance

name: Modified Silencer
description: Using modified or noisy silencer

name: Underage Driving
description: Person below legal age operating vehicle
